SourceNotes: dating and other info from Avril, Bourges, 87-90 (includes text at 91-98)
GeneralNotes: Seem to be additional statutes added to an earlier Liber synodalis, perhaps on model of Clermont
DatingNotes: 1285x1290; renewed in 1295 by Bp Raynaud de la Porte
EditionOther: Lecler, “Anciens statuts du diocèse de Limoges," 143-151;
